Hi, thanks for downloading the Bugs Bunny Rig!

I'm an associate character tech artist, my name is Matheus and I did the body rig (@lucathyel), in collaboration with Sirrena Holmes that created the facial rig (@infinitisirrena)

Credits:
Body rig - https://www.artstation.com/lucathyel / https://twitter.com/lucathyel
Facial rig - https://www.artstation.com/sirrenaholmes / https://twitter.com/infinitisirrena

Model by JC Thornton (https://www.patreon.com/jcthornton)

If you face any issues while animating, please don't hesitate to contact us on our social media! I'll respond as soon as I can and I'll try my best to address every issue you have.
Please share any animation you create along with credits where its due.

Thanks a lot and have fun!
